Title: Respect teachers, love students, to create a new style of teacher-student relations
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: The characters used in the title follow the second round of character simplifications (known as erjian, or "second round simplified characters") that was promulgated in 1977. It was poorly received, and in 1986 the authorities rescinded the second round completely.
